body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Roger Smith. May I have your name, please?

Hi Roger, this is Joyce Bennett. I'm not very happy right now.

I'm sorry to hear that, Joyce. Let's see how I can assist you. Could you please tell me the issue you're facing?

I enrolled my daughter for piano lessons, but they keep rescheduling her classes without any notice!

I apologize for the inconvenience, Joyce. Could I please have your daughter's student ID to look into the matter?

Her student ID is one two three four.

Thank you, Joyce. I'll check the schedule right away. Also, could you confirm the email address we have on file for notifications?

It's joyce.bennett at email dot com.

I've located the issue, and I'll ensure the situation is resolved promptly. I'll also update our records to prevent this from happening again.

Thank you for your patience, Joyce. I'll send you a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

No, that's it. Thanks, Roger.

You're welcome, Joyce. Thank you for reaching out, and have a great day!
